new-device-defaults.title: new device defaults
new-device-defaults.description: Select what should happen when new devices are added to Homey.

homekit-pairing.title: homekit pairing
homekit-pairing.description: Pairing code to add HomeKitty to the Home app.

expose-all.title: Publish All
expose-all.description: This will publish all supported Homey devices to HomeKit. You can then remove specific devices using the device list. Requires app restart.
expose-all.restart-app: The HomeKitty app will now restart, please to back to the app page.

unexpose-all.title: Remove All
unexpose-all.button: Remove all Homey devices from HomeKit
unexpose-all.description: This will remove all Homey devices from HomeKit. You can then publish specific devices using the device list. Requires app restart.

devices.description: Select which devices should be appear in HomeKit.

identifier.title: Bridge Identifier
identifier.description: Change the bridge identifier if you have multiple Homeys in your network. Each Homey should have a unique identifier. Requires app restart.
identifier.restart-app: Bridge identifier has been changed, the HomeKitty app will now restart.

reset.description: If you have problems trying to add Homey to HomeKit (e.g. if HomeKit can't find the HomeKitty bridge), you can perform a full reset.
reset.restart-app: HomeKitty has been reset, the HomeKitty app is will now restart.

app.stopping: HomeKitty app has stopped and should be restarted manually.

errors.API_ADD_DEVICE_FAILED: Unable to add device to HomeKit
errors.API_DELETE_DEVICE_FAILED: Unable to remove device from HomeKit
errors.API_DEVICE_LIMIT_REACHED: Cannot add device due to HomeKit device limit (150)
